name: Sushi Roll 2
description:
How To Play (Keyboard/Mouse):

  • Arrow keys or mouse to navigate menu.
  • Left Mouse or "X" to select in menu.
  • Esc to pause in-game or go back in menu.
  • "A" and "D" to tilt the sushi ball.
  • Mouse X position to rotate the platforms.

How To Play (Controller):

  • Left Joystick to navigate menu.
  • "A" to select in menu.
  • START to pause in-game
  • "B" to go back in menu.
  • Left Joystick to tilt the sushi ball.
  • Right Joystick to rotate the platforms.
